# separatorConfiguration

**Instance Property**

The section’s preferred configuration for list separators.

## Declaration

```swift
var separatorConfiguration: UIListSeparatorConfiguration { get set }
```

## Discussion

This configuration only takes effect if [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/showsSeparators] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

For more granular control over list separator appearance, use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/itemSeparatorHandler-swift.property].

## Configuring separators

- **showsSeparators**: A Boolean value that determines whether the list shows separators between cells.
- **UIListSeparatorConfiguration**: A configuration that controls the list separator appearance in a list section.
- **itemSeparatorHandler**: The closure that provides granular control over the list separator appearance of each item.
- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.ItemSeparatorHandler**: A closure that provides granular control over list separator appearance.
